Package com.btp

Class Resources

java.lang.Object
com.btp.Resources
@Path("resources")
public class Resources
extends java.lang.Object
Root resource (exposed at "myresource" path)

    • getResources

      @GET @Produces("application/json") public java.lang.String getResources()
      Method handling HTTP GET requests. The returned object will be sent to the client as "text/plain" media type.
      Returns:
      String that will be returned as a text/plain response.

    • getUser

      Sends a user with a specific email
      Parameters:
      email - String value of the email of the user
      Returns:
      User

      Parameters:
      user - user to be created
      uniqueID - boolean to check if the id is unique

    • moveRecipe

      @GET @Path("moveRecipe") public java.lang.String moveRecipe​(@QueryParam("recipeId") int id, @QueryParam("businessId") int businessId)
      Moves a recipe to the other business list
      Parameters:
      id - int id of the recipe to be moved
      businessId - int id of the business that owns the recipe
      Returns:
      String "1" if moved from private to public, "0" from public to private

    • showPublic

      Shows the publicList of the business
      Parameters:
      id - int the id of the specific business
      filter - String the filter used to sort the recipe
      Returns:
      ArrayList with the recipe information

      Parameters:
      id - int the id of the specific business

      ArrayList with the recipe information

    • rateBusiness

      @GET @Path("rateBusiness") public java.lang.String rateBusiness​(@QueryParam("id") int id, @QueryParam("rating") int rating, @QueryParam("email") java.lang.String email)
      Rates a business
      Parameters:
      id - int the id of the business to be rated
      rating - int the rating of the user
      email - String the email of the user rating the business
      Returns:
      String "0" if previously rated, "1" if not

    • shareRecipe

      @GET @Path("shareRecipe") @Produces("application/json") public java.lang.String shareRecipe​(@QueryParam("id") int id, @QueryParam("email") java.lang.String email)
      Shares a recipe to its myMenu
      Parameters:
      id - int of the recipe
      email - String of the user sharing the recipe
      Returns:
      String "1" if the recipe was shared, "0" if not

    • commentRecipe

      @GET @Path("commentRecipe") @Produces("application/json") public java.lang.String commentRecipe​(@QueryParam("id") int id, @QueryParam("comment") java.lang.String comment, @QueryParam("email") java.lang.String email)
      Comments a recipe
      Parameters:
      id - int id of the recipe
      comment - String comment
      email - String email of the user commenting
      Returns:
      String "1" to notify the client the action was successful

    • deleteRecipe

      @GET @Path("deleteRecipe") @Produces("application/json") public java.lang.String deleteRecipe​(@QueryParam("email") java.lang.String email, @QueryParam("id") int id, @QueryParam("fromMyMenu") java.lang.String fromMyMenu)
      Deletes a recipe from the database or myMenu depending of user ownership
      Parameters:
      email - String email of the user asking for deletion
      id - int id of the recipe
      fromMyMenu - String "1" if the request comes from an user profile, "0" if it comes from a business profile
      Returns:
      String "1" if deletion was successful, "0" if the recipe doesn't exist

    • isEmailNew

      @GET @Path("isEmailNew") @Produces("application/json") public java.lang.String isEmailNew​(@QueryParam("email") java.lang.String email)
      Checks if an email is in the database
      Parameters:
      email - String email to be checked
      Returns:
      String "1" if its on the database, "0" if not

      @GET @Path("deleteAllNotifications") public java.lang.String deleteAllNotifications​(@QueryParam("id") java.lang.String id)
      Deletes al notifications of an user
      Parameters:
      id - String email of the user
      Returns:
      String "1" if it was successful, "0" if not

    • authUserAndPassword

      @GET @Path("auth") @Produces("application/json") public java.lang.String authUserAndPassword​(@QueryParam("email") java.lang.String email, @QueryParam("password") java.lang.String password) throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Logins an user to its account
      Parameters:
      email - String email of the user entering the account
      password - String password of the user
      Returns:
      String "1" if login was successful, "0" if was unsuccessful, "2" if the email isn't in the database
      Throws:
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

    • myMenu

      @GET @Path("myMenu") @Produces("application/json") public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> myMenu​(@QueryParam("email") java.lang.String email, @QueryParam("filter") java.lang.String filter)
      Shows the myMenu of a specific user and using a filter to sort the list
      Parameters:
      email - String email of the user
      filter - String filter to be used as a sort
      Returns:
      ArrayList with the sorted recipes of the myMenu of that user

      Parameters:
      email - String email of the user
      Returns:

      Parameters:
      ownEmail - String email of the user sending the request
      followingEmail - String email of the user that needs to be checked
      Returns:

    • isChefRated

      @GET @Path("isChefRated") @Produces("application/json") public java.lang.String isChefRated​(@QueryParam("ownEmail") java.lang.String ownEmail, @QueryParam("chefEmail") java.lang.String chefEmail)
      Checks if a chef was rated by a specific user. Calls a private method
      Parameters:
      ownEmail - String email of the user rating the chef
      chefEmail - String email of the chef to be rated
      Returns:
      String "0" if the chef can be rated, "1" if it can't be rated

    • rateChef

      Parameters:
      ownEmail - String email of the user rating the chef
      chefEmail - String email of the chef
      score - int Rating sent by the user
      Returns:
      "0" if the rating was successful, "1" if not

      Parameters:
      id - int the id of the recipe
      email - String email of the user rating the recipe
      Returns:

    • rateRecipe

      @GET @Path("rateRecipe") @Produces("application/json") public java.lang.String rateRecipe​(@QueryParam("id") int id, @QueryParam("email") java.lang.String email, @QueryParam("rating") int score)
      Rates a recipe
      Parameters:
      id - int the id of the recipe to be rated
      email - String the email of the user sending the rating
      score - int the score assigned by the user
      Returns:
      String "1" if the user already rated this recipe, "0" if the recipe was scored successfully

      Makes a user follow another user
      Parameters:
      ownEmail - String email of the user sending the request
      followingEmail - String email of the user who is being followed
      Returns:
      String "0" if it already follows the user, "1" if the request was successful

      Parameters:
      email - String email of the user to change the data
      newPassword - String the new password
      password - String the old password
      Returns:
      String "1" if the password was changed, "0" if not
      Throws:
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

    • filterRecommend

      @GET @Path("filterRecommend") @Produces("application/json") public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> filterRecommend​(@QueryParam("array") java.lang.String list, @QueryParam("data") java.lang.String data)
      Searches a list of recipes using a filter and a text to be matched
      Parameters:
      list - String the list in String format of the recipes to be searched
      data - String text to be matched
      Returns:
      ArrayList with all the recipes that matched

    • recommended

      @GET @Path("recommend") @Produces("application/json") public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> recommended​(@QueryParam("email") java.lang.String email)
      Sends a list of recommended profiles to an specific user
      Parameters:
      email - String email of the user searching recommendations
      Returns:
      ArrayList with 15 recommended profiles the user hasn't rated or followed.

      ArrayList of the highest rated profiles

    • filteredSearch

      @GET @Path("searchByFilter") @Produces("application/json") public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> filteredSearch​(@QueryParam("search") java.lang.String search, @QueryParam("filter") java.lang.String filter)
      Searches a text using an specific attribute of the recipe class
      Parameters:
      search - String text to be searched
      filter - String attribute to be matched (dishTag, dishType, dishTime)
      Returns:
      ArrayList with all the matching profiles

    • search

      Searches in the database a line of text
      Parameters:
      search - String name/text to be searched
      Returns:
      ArrayList with all the profiles that matched the search

      @POST @Path("addRecipePicture") @Consumes("application/json") public static void addRecipePicture​(@QueryParam("id") int id, java.lang.String photo)
      this method takes an id and a String in base64 and takes that image, decodes it into a byte array and sends it to a method to save on disk
      Parameters:
      id - int id of the recipe
      photo - String in base64 of the photo

      this method takes an id and a String in base64 and takes that image, decodes it into a byte array and sends it to a method to save on disk
      Parameters:
      id - String id of the user's picture
      photo - String in base64 of the photo

      @POST @Path("addBusinessPicture") @Consumes("application/json") public static void addBusinessPicture​(@QueryParam("id") int id, java.lang.String photo)

      Parameters:
      id - int id of the business's picture
      photo - String in base64 of the photo

    • chefRequest

      @GET @Path("chefRequest") @Produces("application/json") public java.lang.String chefRequest​(@QueryParam("id") java.lang.String id)
      Sends a request to the server admins to be labeled as chef
      Parameters:
      id - String email of the user sending the request
      Returns:
      String "2" if the request was successful, "0" if the request is pending approval, "1" if the user is a chef

      @GET @Path("getBusiness") public Business getBussiness​(@QueryParam("id") int id)

      Returns:
      Business obj

    • createBusiness

      @POST @Path("createBusiness") @Consumes("application/json") public static void createBusiness​(Business business)
      This method is used to create a business obj assigns it an id, and adds it to the database, it also adds the id to the users id
      Parameters:
      business - Business obj

    • addEmployee

      @GET @Path("addEmployee") public java.lang.String addEmployee​(@QueryParam("email") java.lang.String email, @QueryParam("id") int id)
      This method adds an user to a business user list, and sets the reference on the users attribute
      Parameters:
      email - String email of the user that is being added to the business
      id - int id of the business
      Returns:
      String response, depending on different scenarios; 3:user doesnt exist, 2:business doesnt exist, 0 if the user already belongs to a business, and 1 if everything worked

    • isEmployee

      @GET @Path("isEmployee") public java.lang.String isEmployee​(@QueryParam("email") java.lang.String email, @QueryParam("id") int id)
      Gets if an user is an employee of a business
      Parameters:
      email - String email of the user
      id - int id of the business
      Returns:
      String "1" if the user is an employee, "0" if not
